author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sailpoint Q1 Loss Per Share $0.07
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - SailPoint Technologies Holdings Inc :
* SAILPOINT ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 * Q1 REVENUE $49.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $44.6 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.07 TO $0.09
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.02 TO $0.03
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $49.5 MILLION TO $50.5 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.03 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.03, REVENUE VIEW $49.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.06, REVENUE VIEW $222.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
